import React from 'react'; import { User, GraduationCap, Code, Lightbulb, MapPin, Github } from 'lucide-react'; const About: React.FC = () => { const highlights = [ { icon: , title: "Final Year Student", description: "Pursuing my degree with a strong focus on software engineering and backend development" }, { icon: , title: "Backend Developer", description: "Specializing in Java, Spring Framework, and building robust server-side applications" }, { icon: , title: "Learning Frontend", description: "Currently expanding my skillset to include React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies" } ]; return (

About Me

I'm a passionate backend developer who loves turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code

{/* Left Column - Text Content */}

Who I Am

I'm a final year student from Delhi, India with a deep passion for backend development and server-side technologies. My journey in programming started with Java, and I've since become proficient in Spring Framework, JWT authentication, and building scalable REST APIs.

While I'm primarily focused on backend development, I'm actively expanding my skillset to include frontend technologies like React and TypeScript. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating robust systems that can handle real-world challenges.

{/* Key Highlights */}
{highlights.map((highlight, index) => (
{highlight.icon}

{highlight.title}

{highlight.description}

))}
{/* Right Column - Visual Element */}

What I'm Currently Working On

Expanding my knowledge in frontend development and advanced Java patterns

3+
Years Coding
20
GitHub Repos
5+
Technologies
100%
Dedication
{/* Location and GitHub */}
Delhi, India
@Nitish-11k
); }; export default About;
